meanings.definition: Gruffest: rough or harsh in manner or voice
meanings.sent1: The gruffest man in town always spoke loudly.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his gruffest tone when giving orders.
meanings.sent3: The gruffest dog at the shelter turned out to be a big softie.
meanings.sent4: Her gruffest exterior hid a heart of gold.
meanings.sent5: The gruffest teacher had a strict but caring approach.

meanings.definition: Gruffest: having a rough or harsh texture or quality
meanings.sent1: The gruffest sandpaper was used for heavy-duty tasks.
meanings.sent2: The gruffest fabric felt uncomfortable against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The gruffest towel felt like sandpaper after being washed with bleach.
meanings.sent4: His gruffest beard scratched her cheek when he kissed her.
meanings.sent5: The gruffest surface of the rock made it difficult to climb.
